name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Clinton JONES, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Clinton JONES, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence of the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia County is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Carl E. Watts, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Sarah B. Vandenbraak, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
424 A.2d 494
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Clinton JONES, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 16, 1980.
Decided Jan. 27, 1981.
Carl E. Watts, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Sarah B. Vandenbraak, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
